attributes.additional_details: This is help reduce suicide and self-harm during the COVID19 Pandemic. Its simple we don't want to make the same mistakes.  We want to learn from our colleagues across the channel and help us reduce the risk of mental illness. People are killing and harming themselves because they can't cope with the Pandemic.
attributes.background: We need the government to look at a strategy to invest in resources that will look after our mental health when helping other people. Frontline and Key workers need support and resources in personal protective equipment for their mental health.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307724
